headlines.description: Arsenal moved level on points with fourth-placed West Ham United after enjoying a comfortable 2-0 win over Newcastle United on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal move closer to top 4 with Newcastle win

headlines.description: — Steven Gerrard got the better of Patrick Vieira in the battle of the English Premier League greats-turned-managers as goals from Matt Targett and John McGinn secured a 2-1 win for Aston Villa at Crystal Palace on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gerrard gets better of Vieira in battle of EPL greats

headlines.description: Diogo Jota scored the fastest goal of the 2021-22 Premier League season on Saturday at Anfield as Liverpool thrashed Southampton 4-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jota stars as Liverpool thrash Southampton

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers were held to a 0-0 draw at lowly Norwich City in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves held to goalless draw at Norwich

events.name: Leeds United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion extended their winless run in the Premier League to eight games when they were held to a 0-0 draw at home to Leeds United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton frustrated in 0-0 draw with Leeds
